Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Joe Biden's statement by suggesting that he will not share his general stances on issues at all.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that Biden did make a similar comment on court-packing, indicating that he would clarify his position before the election.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement attributed to Joe Biden.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Biden's statement about not sharing his stances until after the election applies to all issues, which may not be accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for Biden's statement, which is that he did make a similar comment about clarifying his position on court-packing before the election.
